column5: I don't think I ever shared my entry into the wfn adopt an angler contest on here.  It took me until near the end of the contest to get it finished so I wasn't even close int he running for secondary prizes based on online voting.  But I held out and waited, waited waited...until they finally announced the winner.  And it wasn't me...  The winner was from Woodstock, maybe he's a member on here.  Anyway, I meant to share this earlier but kept forgetting.  Here's my entry, even though I didn't win it sure was fun to make.  http://www.wfn.tv/adopt/x6p2269g-1
Evan...GREAT video!!!  Had to laugh at the whole morning routine...LOL.  Like I said...amazing work...you sound disappointed in your post, but the video was awesome.

That was hilarious Evan, very well done.  Sorry you didn't win, I didn't either.  I'm sure WFN made a long, thought out decision on who should have won and deserved it, it took them quite a long time.   Try to get your entry in earlier next year and let us know, we can all vote  Congrats to the winner, wonder if he's an OFC'r?  Joey
Very very good video, funny at times too. Nice job, to bad u didn't win
The video is a winner whichever way you look at it, great job!
That was fantastic and the best one I've seen....  Great job!  Sorry you didn't win.....  Cheers
Great video Evan! I loved the part fishing the pond and you catch a glove...that ranks slightly lower than an old boot! Better luck next year. -Brian
